name: The Rhythm Of Our Hearts
description:
It feels like jazz.
There is no definite improv pattern here.
Our melody is the voice of honesty.
The difference in our perspective is dynamic polyrhythms.
The pride that we have about ourselves is energy.
And our sincerity is pure emotion.
Is this life or is this love?
We don't care anymore.
We just need to control every ego to keep the rhythm going.
Is this light or darkness?
We don't know exactly.
Everything revolves around our intuition.
Is this harmony, is this chaos?
We don't know how it is.
We just need to feel it forever.
